title: Definitions
content: In this Act, unless the context otherwise requires— (1) "abridged prospectus" means a memorandum containing such salient features of a prospectus as may be specified by SEBI...

title: Incorporation of company
content: (1) There shall be filed with the Registrar within whose jurisdiction the registered office of a company is proposed to be situated, the following documents: (a) the memorandum and articles of the company duly signed by all subscribers...

title: Company to have Board of Directors
content: (1) Every company shall have a Board of Directors consisting of individuals as directors and shall have— (a) minimum 3 directors for public company, 2 for private company, 1 for One Person Company...
